oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.lov
Interface TagCloudLOVController

All Known Implementing Classes:
GlobalSearchTagCloudLOVBean
public interface TagCloudLOVController

An interface defining the actions taken in a tag cloud list of values.
